title: Configuration for Azure interactive auth prompt

azureEnvironment.description: The Azure environment the storage account exists in. Defaults to AzurePublicCloud.

minimumValidityInMinutes.description: If specified and a credential exists that will be valid for at least this many minutes from the time of execution, no action will be taken.

globalCommands.description: The set of global rush commands before which this plugin should update credentials.

phasedCommands.description: The set of phased rush commands before which this plugin should update credentials.

authList.description: An array with the credential details to be retrieved from each Azure Storage location
